message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.GR, cs.HC, cs.IR 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely category as the paper proposes a data-driven approach to solve the Pano2Vid task, which involves identifying space-time "glimpses" of interest and selecting optimal camera trajectories. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is also likely as the paper deals with video content and cinematography. 
- cs.GR (Graphics) is relevant as the paper involves rendering panoramic videos into normal field-of-view videos. 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is relevant as the paper aims to free both the videographer and the end viewer from the task of determining what to watch. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is less likely but still possible as the paper involves compiling a dataset of 360$^{\circ}$ videos downloaded from the web.
